vuetify-light-sticker.description: Stick them to your car, laptop or favorite mug. They are made from a durable vinyl with a laminate that is weather-proof against rain, sun, wind and snow, and even dishwasher safe.
vuetify-light-sticker.title: Light Vuetify Stickers

vuetify-dark-sticker.description: Stick them to your car, laptop or favorite mug. They are made from a durable vinyl with a laminate that is weather-proof against rain, sun, wind and snow, and even dishwasher safe.
vuetify-dark-sticker.title: Dark Vuetify Stickers

black-vuetify-cap.description: An updated classic that won't break the bank! This hat perfectly combines style and function.
black-vuetify-cap.title: Black Vuetify Cap

full-zip-vuetify-jacket.description: The Vuetify Full-Zip Fleece is a great lightweight jacket to keep on hand during the chilly season.
full-zip-vuetify-jacket.title: Full-Zip Vuetify Jacket

premium-charcoal-vuetify-beanie.description: Stay warm with the new Premium Knit Vuetify Beanie available in black, navy and charcoal.
premium-charcoal-vuetify-beanie.title: Charcoal Vuetify Beanie

v-developer-tee.description: The <v-developer /> design is now on a Premium Fitted Short Sleeve Crew tee!
v-developer-tee.title: V-Developer Tee

vuetify-epic-backpack.description: The Vuetify Epic Backpack is a premium backpack that has a spot for everything you travel with.
vuetify-epic-backpack.title: Vuetify Epic Backpack

vue-school.description: Learn Vue.js and modern and cutting-edge front-end technologies with our premium tutorials and video courses.
vue-school.title: Vue School

dashboard-pro.title: Material Dashboard Pro
dashboard-pro.description: Vuetify Material Dashboard PRO is a beautiful theme built over Vuetify, Vuex and Vuejs. Vuetify Material Dashboard PRO is the official Vuejs version of the Original Material Dashboard PRO.

shopify-e-commerce.title: Shopify E-commerce
shopify-e-commerce.description: A handcrafted Vuetify e-commerce application built on top of Shopify. Meticulous tweaks for optimal performance, user experience and accessibility make this theme stand out as a must have for anyone selling or wanting to sell with Shopify.

material-kit.title: Material Kit
material-kit.description: A complete set of Material Inspired themes built with Vuetify on top of Vue CLI 3.

alpha-theme.title: Alpha Theme
alpha-theme.description: Complete theme experience including enhanced Vue CLI 3, full documentation, 5 custom components and much more!

dashboard.title: Material Dashboard Free
dashboard.description: Vuetify Material Dashboard Free is a beautiful resource built over Vuetify, Vuex and Vuejs. It will help you get started developing dashboards in no time.

freelance.title: Freelancer
freelance.description: A single page Material inspired theme for Freelancers.

parallax.title: Parallax
parallax.description: This beautiful single page parallax is a great home page for any application.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: A simple template that features a clean interface for creating a blog or blog-like application.
